snippet: Moody’s said the European Union’s rating would be particularly vulnerable to any changes in the ratings of Germany, France, Britain and the Netherlands.
abstract: Moody’s Investors Service cuts the European Union’s credit outlook to negative; says EU's rating will be particularly vulnerable to any changes in the AAA ratings of Germany, France, Britain and the Netherlands.
lead_paragraph: Moody’s said the European Union’s rating would be particularly vulnerable to any changes in the ratings of Germany, France, Britain and the Netherlands.

headline.seo: Moody’s Reduces Its Outlook for Europe’s Credit Rating
headline.main: Moody’s Reduces Its Outlook for Europe’s Credit Rating
headline.print_headline: Moody’s Reduces Its Outlook For Europe’s Credit Rating
